thread.title: ‘This Is Us’ Cast on What to Expect Moving Forward
thread.title_full: ‘This Is Us’ Cast on What to Expect Moving Forward

title: ‘This Is Us’ Cast on What to Expect Moving Forward
text: Superfan TV • January 9, 2017 This is Us won the hearts of audiences last fall with its emotional look at the past and present life of a unique family. With a critically acclaimed cast, including Golden Globe nominees Mandy Moore and Chrissy Metz, we fell in love with the Pearson family as the show revealed surprising plot twists every week. The final episode of 2016 left us with a cliffhanger — as funny-man Toby suffered a serious heart attack. His fate will be revealed when the show returns on Tuesday, and it seems like the shocking reveals will keep on coming. We spoke to cast members Milo Ventimiglia, Justin Hartley, and Chris Sullivan on the red carpet of the Golden Globes to learn more about what the rest of the season has in store. All we can say is #PrayForToby. Related:
